en: Open the Heart Trial Cave (Dwelling Place)

You want to pick up a Big Heart, but the cave leading to it is blocked by a large rock. A sign near the entrance suggests that to open the cave, you must play the chicken pinball game you used to play as a child.\nPassword: 1.RRR 2.YYY 3.BBB

Remove the left side portal that blocks the way. A sign near the entrance suggests that to open the cave, you must play the chicken pinball game you used to play as a child.\nPassword: 1.YRB 2.YRB 3.YRB

Remove the right side portal that blocks the way.  A sign near the entrance suggests that to open the cave, you must play the chicken pinball game you used to play as a child.\nPassword: 1.BRY 2.YYR 3.RBB
Read the signpost near the Heart Trial Cave.
Open the entrance to the Heart Trial Cave.
The cave beneath your house is actually a trial cave. If you're strong and smart enough, you'll be able to open the path to the Big Heart.
Complete the puzzle trial in the cave beneath your house.
